snippet: In training for the New York City Marathon, perhaps the most interesting map to draw was a 13-mile run in Jerusalem.
abstract: Talya Minsberg essay says 13-mile route in Jerusalem was one of hardest and rewarding runs of her training for New York City Marathon.
lead_paragraph: In training for the New York City Marathon, perhaps the most interesting map to draw was a 13-mile run in Jerusalem.

headline.print_headline: Maps of All Kinds Helped in Planning Long Runs
headline.main: Maps of All Kinds Helped in Planning Long Runs
